item.title: Notice biographique sur la vie, la conversion et la mort de Manoah, membre de l'église de Thaba-Bossiou, chez les Béchuanas-Bassoutos (Afrique Méridionale)
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of an obituary by the French missionary Eugène Casalis, being a booklet published as an extract from the French missionary periodical Journal des Missions évangéliques. The obituary commemorates Entouta Manoah, first Christian convert to die in Lesotho.]
